titles.title: Safeguarding Classrooms Hurt by ObamaCare's Obligatory Levies
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt certain educational institutions from the employer health insurance mandate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/11/2014--Introduced. Safeguarding Classrooms Hurt by ObamaCare's Obligatory Levies - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude any elementary or secondary school, state or local educational agency, and institution of higher education from the definition of "applicable large employer" for purposes of the employer mandate to provide health care coverage for employees.
